trans-unit.source: The mobile service project lets you to run your new mobile service locally.
trans-unit.target: The mobile service project lets you to run your new mobile service locally.

trans-unit.source: This makes it easy to debug your service code before you even publish it to Azure.
trans-unit.target: This makes it easy to debug your service code before you even publish it to Azure.

trans-unit.source: On your Windows PC, download your personalized server project, extract it, and then open it in Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: On your Windows PC, download your personalized server project, extract it, and then open it in Visual Studio.

trans-unit.source: Press the **F5** key to rebuild the project and start the mobile service locally.
trans-unit.target: Press the **F5** key to rebuild the project and start the mobile service locally.

trans-unit.source: A web page is displayed after the mobile service starts successfully.
trans-unit.target: A web page is displayed after the mobile service starts successfully.
